title: Xoriant makes third acquisition with Jaipur-based Fexle
description: ChrysCapital-backed Xoriant aims to elevate its Salesforce practice, advance AI capabilities and optimise data utilisation by integrating Fexleâ€™s architects, seasoned consultants and developers, it said.
content: US-based consulting and IT services firm Xoriant Thursday said it has acquired Jaipur-based Salesforce consulting services firm Fexle to strengthen its capability of delivering artificial intelligence-powered front-end digital engineering platforms.
